conditions.displayName: GPU Processing Utilization is high for: ${JOBSET_NAME}

conditionThreshold.filter: resource.type = "k8s_container" AND metric.type = "kubernetes.io/container/accelerator/duty_cycle" AND metric.label."make"!="cloud-tpu" AND resource.labels.project_id=~"${PROJECT_ID}" AND resource.labels.cluster_name=~"${CLUSTER_NAME}" AND resource.labels.location=~"${CLUSTER_LOCATION}" AND resource.labels.namespace_name=~"${NAMESPACE_NAME}" AND metadata.user_labels."jobset.sigs.k8s.io/jobset-name"=~"${JOBSET_NAME}"
